<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Sodden Scavenger](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=101)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 94 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Region** Mwangi Expanse

</column>

You’ve managed to eke out an existence in the storm-wracked Sodden Lands and have become an expert at scavenging food and tools.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Constitution
or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) skill, and the [Swamp Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Forager](/Feats.aspx?ID=786) skill feat.
